levels.description:
Fires <@ba.vup>{attack@times}</> times with <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK when attacking and attacks random targets within Attack Range
<@ba.rem>Automatically activated; Amiya is <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for {stun} seconds after the skill duration</>
